Check the browser console and network tabs for more information. ## Does the console show the error "No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header"? This means the server that hosts your file does not allow requests from other sites (cross-origin requests, or CORS). You need to move the asset to a server that allows cross-origin file downloads. Learn more about CORS at https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/CORS. If your file is on GitHub, load it from "raw.githubusercontent.com". Here's how to do that: 1. Start with the original GitHub URL of the file. For example: https://github.com/username/repository/blob/branch/filename. 2. Replace "github.com" with "raw.githubusercontent.com". 3. Remove the "/blob/" part of the URL.
